Ķemeri National park

The next stop is in Jurmala - Ķemeri National Park. It was founded in 1997. This is one of the biggest National parks in Latvia. Ķemeri bog is more than 8000 years old and is one of the largest moss bogs In Latvia. The 3.5 km long Great Ķemeri Moor Bog footbridge is spectacular , where we and our brothers often go for walks. The first footbridge in the Great Ķemeri Moor was built already in 2000, which is also my year of birth. Ten years ago it was also reconstructed. It would still be a sight today, but for now the road is being repaired in the Ķemeri section, so I go along Liepaja highway.
